vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δοκῐμάζω,
(δόκιμος) assay, test, πορφύραν καὶ χρυσόν [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—middle, prove for oneself, choose, χώραν [Refs 5th c.BC+]:— passive, ἐπειδὰν τὸ ἔργον.. δοκιμασθῇ [Refs]
__2 of persons, δ. αὐτούς put them to the test, make trial of them, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; also of Apis-bulls, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II approve, sanction, μετὰ δεδοκιμασμένου [λόγου] μὴ ξυνέπεσθαι [Refs 5th c.BC+]infinitive, ἐκπονεῖν ἐδοκίμαζε he approved of their working, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 as a political term,
__II.2.a approve after scrutiny as fit for an office, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, to be approved as fit, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; μου δοκιμαζομένου when I was undergoing a scrutiny, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; δεδοκιμασμένος [ἰατρός] [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: metaphorically, ὃν ὁ Ἥφαιστος ἐδοκίμασεν [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; ὑπὲρ τοῦ στεφανωθῆναι δοκιμάζομαι [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.2.b pass as fit to serve, ἱππεύειν δεδοκιμασμένος [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2.c examine and admit boys to the class of ἔφηβοι or ἔφηβοι to the rights of manhood, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2.d test an orator's right to speak [Refs]
__II.3 with infinitive, think fit to do, [Refs 1st c.AD+]: with negative, refuse to do, [NT+1st c.AD+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 蒙悅納, 所稱許, 試驗
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 蒙悦纳, 所称许, 试验

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
testing, trying, examination
proof, probation, testing,trying, examination, Heb. 3:9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: probar, examinar, poner a prueba ; interpretar, discernir, descubrir ; aprobar; probar, demonstrar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 試驗, 檢視, 驗證
2) 證明, 認可, 認定是有價值的
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 试验, 检视, 验证
2) 证明, 认可, 认定是有价值的
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Chịu thử thách. Tôi bước vào sự thử thách, chịu thử thách, chịu kiểm tra; tôi khác biệt bởi sự thử thách, được chấp thuận sau thử thách; tôi thích hợp / sẵn sàng
